command 401: when buildingThe bottom layer is for all tiles which 
command 401: are to be seen on the bottom.
command 101: \Name[???]\P[1]The middle layer is for things on top 
command 401: of that, but may still have something else covering it. 
command 101: \Name[???]\P[1]The top layer is for things 
command 401: covering the middle layer tiles.

command 401: there is also an event layer for tiles even on top of 
command 401: those ones.

command 401: their appearence.

command 401: in the tileset.

command 401: given a * star rating, which will determine its priority.

command 401: tempority had managed to persist apart

command 401: age banded together to face time itself.
